title: THE ASHES 2024 - LEGENDS COLLIDE
storyline: A high-energy cricket series promo showcasing the intensity and legacy of The Ashes. The narrative uses rapid jump cuts of different legendary players in identical batting positions, each executing powerful shots. The sequence builds momentum through the repetition of the same action (batting stance to shot) but with different players, creating a sense of timeless tradition and fierce competition. The promo culminates in a dramatic reveal of the series details with the Ashes urn coming towards camera.
caption: Same position. Same passion. Different legends. The Ashes 2024.

camera_setup.camera_position: Side-on to batsman, positioned at square leg, looking towards off-side.

camera_movement.purpose: Maintain consistent framing across all jump cuts to emphasize the repetition and rhythm.

camera_consistency.critical_visual_anchors: Batsman positioned in center frame, batting stance identical across all cuts.
camera_consistency.lighting_direction: High-contrast stadium lighting from above and side, creating dramatic shadows.
camera_consistency.compositional_notes: CRITICAL: Player must be in EXACT same position in frame for all 4 cuts. Batting stance (feet position, bat lift) must be identical. Only the player's face and uniform colors change.

generation_strategy.reason: Requires 4 separate generations with identical framing but different players. Each cut is 2-2.5s, perfect for jump cut technique showing passage of time and different legends.
generation_strategy.post_production_notes: Stitch 4 separate shots with hard jump cuts. Cut 1 (2.0s): Steve Smith. Cut 2 (2.5s): Joe Root. Cut 3 (2.0s): Pat Cummins. Cut 4 (2.5s): Ben Stokes. Total: 9.0s. Each cut shows: stance (0.5s) → swing (1.0s) → follow-through (0.5-1.0s).

scenes.video_prompt:
This scene requires 4 SEPARATE video generations, each 2-2.5 seconds:

CUT 1 (2.0s): Medium shot, 85mm lens, f/2.8. Steve Smith (35, blonde, Australian whites, baggy green) in batting stance at crease. Side-on angle. He lifts bat, executes powerful cover drive, follows through. High-contrast stadium lighting. Static camera. Player centered in frame.

CUT 2 (2.5s): IDENTICAL framing and camera position. Joe Root (33, brown hair, England whites, helmet) in EXACT same batting stance position. He lifts bat, executes elegant straight drive, follows through. Same lighting and composition as Cut 1.

CUT 3 (2.0s): IDENTICAL framing and camera position. Pat Cummins (31, dark hair, Australian whites) in EXACT same batting stance position. He lifts bat, executes aggressive pull shot, follows through. Same lighting and composition.

CUT 4 (2.5s): IDENTICAL framing and camera position. Ben Stokes (33, ginger hair, England whites, helmet) in EXACT same batting stance position. He lifts bat, executes powerful hook shot, follows through. Same lighting and composition.

CRITICAL: All 4 cuts must have identical camera position, framing, and player position in frame. Only the player and shot type change. This creates the jump cut effect.
